如何找到一个好的、人员齐全的疗养院很少有人愿意进入疗养院，但如果您或您所爱的人有身体或认知障碍或从手术中恢复，那么这样做可能是正确的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/How-to-find-a-good-well-staffed-nursing-home.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/How-to-find-a-good-well-staffed-nursing-home.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e9404d6-3dd1-44d2-8a52-de7a2fd892ca Fri, 12 Jul 2024 08:28:07 -0400 How to find a good, well-staffed nursing home
救生药物和警察项目标志着加州首次使用阿片类药物结算现金去年，索尼娅·维杜戈 (Sonja Verdugo) 的丈夫因服用阿片类药物过量而去世。她定期向洛杉矶街头生活和垂死的吸毒者提供医疗用品。她还在洛杉矶市政厅倡导制定解决毒瘾和无家可归问题的政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Life saving-drugs-and-police-projects-mark-first-use-of-opioid-settlement-cash-in-California.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Life saving-drugs-and-police-projects-mark-first-use-of-opioid-settlement-cash-in-California.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62dbdfce-a58b-4931-80a0-77d8f3c28dac Fri, 12 Jul 2024 08:22:54 -0400 Lifesaving drugs and police projects mark first use of opioid settlement cash in California
基于菊粉凝胶的口服免疫疗法可有效抑制食物过敏反应和过敏性休克一种新型口服免疫治疗平台，使用配制的菊粉凝胶与食物过敏原相结合来口服递送饮食抗原。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Inulin-gel-based-oral-immunotherapy-is- effective-in-suppressing-food-allergy-responses-and-anaphyctic-shock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Inulin-gel-based-oral-immunotherapy-is- effective-in-suppressing-food-allergy-responses-and-anaphyctic-shock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=613abd1a-1f08-4053-84e4-5981084e1755 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 05:18:00 -0400 Inulin gel-based oral immunotherapy is effective in suppressing food allergy responses and anaphylactic shock
怀孕期间接触空气污染物与婴儿脑瘫风险相关吗？怀孕期间产前暴露于环境空气污染与婴儿脑瘫风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Is-air-pollutant-exposure-during-pregnancy- Associate-with-infant-cerebral-palsy-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Is-air-pollutant-exposure-during-pregnancy-linked-with-infant-cerebral-palsy-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=73b3146c-e619-4baf-a32d-2119ccc04b7c Fri, 12 Jul 2024 04:39:00 -0400 Is air pollutant exposure during pregnancy associated with infant cerebral palsy risk?
FDA 批准 PDE4 抑制剂罗氟司特治疗特应性皮炎2024 年 7 月 9 日，美国 FDA 批准 Arcutis Biotherapeutics 的 ZORYVE®（罗氟司特）用于治疗特应性皮炎 (AD)，这是影响美国数百万人的最常见湿疹类型。这种每日一次的不含类固醇的乳膏可能会成为一种新的治疗方法。 AD 的护理标准。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/FDA-approved-PDE4-inhibitor-roflumilast-for-atopic-dermatitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/FDA-approved-PDE4-inhibitor-roflumilast-for-atopic-dermatitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c49706a-f37f-4bab-8e26-67e64d6a117a Fri, 12 Jul 2024 03:59:00 -0400 FDA approved PDE4 inhibitor roflumilast for atopic dermatitis
新研究显示，移民中的 Covid-19 死亡率高出 46%在 Covid-19 大流行期间，难民、境内流离失所者和移民面临的健康风险明显高于其他人群。一项新研究显示，与普通人群相比，移民的感染风险高出 84%，死亡率高出 46%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Covid-19-mortality-4625-higher-among-migrants-new-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Covid-19-mortality-4625-higher-among-migrants-new-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4a33403-1d33-4760-9666-94ca0a91f773 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 02:44:56 -0400 Covid-19 mortality 46% higher among migrants, new research shows
氯氮平可改善难治性精神分裂症的预后德国 Trias i Pujol 研究所 (IGTP) 的精神病学和心理健康研究小组与德尔马医院的 ETEP（精神病发作研究和治疗）小组合作，在《西班牙精神病学和心理健康杂志》上发表了一项研究分析了首次精神病发作 (FEP) 后头两年内难治性精神分裂症患者使用氯氮平的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Clozapine-improves-outcomes-in-treatment-pressive-schizophrenia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Clozapine-improves-outcomes-in-treatment-pressive-schizophrenia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7fc1ae5-8c9c-4070-b473-59d05665b1c5 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 02:32:20 -0400 Clozapine improves outcomes in treatment-resistant schizophrenia
研究发现青少年手术早期不必要的阿片类药物处方一项多机构研究发现，六分之一的青少年在手术前服用阿片类药物处方，3% 的患者在手术后三到六个月仍在服用阿片类药物处方，表明持续使用阿片类药物并可能存在阿片类药物依赖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Study-finds-early-unnecessary-opioid-prescriptions-for-teen-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Study-finds-early-unnecessary-opioid-prescriptions-for-teen-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea87ca4e-0228-4b0c-b529-45593a7b06f9 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 02:26:16 -0400 Study finds early, unnecessary opioid prescriptions for teen surgery
治疗压力性尿失禁的新选择出现美国泌尿外科协会官方期刊《The Journal of Urology®》8 月号上的一项安慰剂对照临床试验报道，一种名为 TAS-303 的研究药物在治疗女性压力性尿失禁 (SUI) 方面显示出有效性和安全性。 AUA）。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/New-option-emerges-for-managing-stress-urinary-incontinence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/New-option-emerges-for-managing-stress-urinary-incontinence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23a2eeec-2a04-41fa-bd9b-04ead8c6329d Fri, 12 Jul 2024 01:46:48 -0400 New option emerges for managing stress urinary incontinence
细胞免疫疗法为实体瘤带来希望一项小型临床试验的早期发现提供了证据，表明新的细胞免疫疗法可能有效治疗转移性实体瘤。在试验中，美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 的研究人员对每位患者的正常白细胞（称为淋巴细胞）进行了基因改造，以产生识别并攻击特定癌细胞的受体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Cellular-immunotherapy-offers-hope-for-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Cellular-immunotherapy-offers-hope-for-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc1ff86a-51ff-473d-9d6f-b623eff78d2b Fri, 12 Jul 2024 01:27:30 -0400 Cellular immunotherapy offers hope for solid tumors
